title: Looking for a Ranked 5s team because I lack freinds

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body: Looking for a ranked 5 team to play with to get better at working as a team in solo queue and Lolking there which I guess will act more as a Resume  I dont play any specific Role I just do whatever so yeah.

replies.body: Im not looking for a duo partner I relish Solo queue but at the same time losing a match with a duo partner almost doubles the LP lost
Only increases LP loss if they have lower MMR then you, if its higher in decreases LP (and increases gain)
I mean rank teams and maybe solo queue
Hey I have a few people who wanna play some ranked 5's, add me Glewis and i'll add u to the team
Hey any chance i could join the team, i've been looking for a team for a while
